title: endaniDam undan
sahitya:
endaniDam undan cintai kanindiDumO cendUr sirandiDum kandA iniyEnum


anupallavi

  cintaik-kavalaiyAl siridum ippEdaiyEn nondu nalindiDAdirundu vandiDavE


caraNam    vandiDum valvinai tandiDum tollai undanai ninandadum uDanODi maraindiDa
endan uLLamadil inba veLLam pAya santatam nilai perum santOSam niraindiDa
